description: Plenty of warmth and comfort in this wool workhorse. Fully cushioned and super snug, Wigwam's Sirocco will make sure your feet are the last thing you need to worry about while playing in the snow.
name: Sirocco Socks

specs.value: 60% Wool, 30% Stretch Nylon, 9% Stretch Polyester, 1% Spandex
